arStrings.szText:
Aldkin occasionally loses control of his curse, transforming into a ferocious demon for {c_number}{SF_3}{/c} seconds. This grants Aldkin powerful new abilities, but the unleashed evil curses you for its duration.

{c_label}Curse of Darkness:{/c} You and nearby enemies become {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c}.
{c_label}Curse of Flames:{/c} Your direct damage Burns enemies for {c_number}{dot:PLAYER_BURN}{/c} damage over {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} seconds, but you lose {c_number}[{SF_7}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Resource per second.

Aldkin's curse and demon form are determined by his {c_important}Mercenary Core Skill{/c}.
You are cursed for being in the presence of Aldkin's demon form!
You are cursed for being in the presence of Aldkin's demon form!
